title: Team Iron is recruiting!

embed.description: The latest Tweets from Team Iron (@TeamIronEsports). No Doubt! No Fear! Australian Esports organisation. Follow for the latest updates on the team!. Australia

body:
Team Iron is looking to break into the challenger series through the open ladder qualifier in 2017. We are looking for people who are passionate about the game, dedicated, have great teamwork, and strive to improve themselves and the team. We are recruiting now to better prepare ourselves for the coming year.

We are looking for a full roster and coach.

Requirements for Players:

+ Diamond 3 and above
+ Working Mic
+ Stable reliable internet
+ Fluent in English
+ Discord
+ Dedicated (were in for the long haul)
+ 18 years +

Send us a DM on our Twitter!

Good luck to all applicants.

replies.body: Your settings don't allow for DMs, just a heads up!
sorry about that DM ACTUALLY open :)

I like the name of the Team :P
Too bad i'm stuck in Silver 2 elo hell.. ripp
currently d3, been playing since season 4,jungle main only, good net and mic, willing to learn whatever champions preferred and wiling to put in time to practice with team. add me ig if u want me :)
